Articles.Content: Now a massive FTL update was release. Feel free to discuss it here. It is a pain that the FTL website is down through...

I got to the boss on the first run....And got completely destroyed,My shields were hacked and a boarding party took out my weapons as I had to use the two men not being used for evading or trapped on the enemy ship to repair oxygen and patch holes in the hull.I wasn't even able to keep them online once the boarding party suffocated to death because almost every system was offline due to the constant bombardment from the ship.I lasted 2 minutes.I had 8 shields,4 engines,a beam weapon,a burst laser,an Ion disabler,a missile launcher,3 pilot,3 doors,and all my crew were level 3.Hell,I could take out a lanius ship without losing any health or shields.

In one run I got a laser chaingun thingy in the first sector. It always deals one damage. First, It charges for 10 seconds, and after charging and shooting 5 times it charges for 1 second! It is so overpowered!

First run: Somehow I had the new species cruiser- was going great, until the rebels caught up. I had no idea they had an ABS system. They targeted the most valuable thing- the pilot, and I died

Second run: got to the boss with kestral B! But I only had 3 basic lasers and a beam and mind control. I basically surrendered, as I had no way of taking it out.
